attributes.action: We, the Responsible Adults of the United Kingdom believe that we should be able to live a life free to choose and quietly enjoy our favourite wines with a minimum of Government taxation. We petition that duty on wine be indefinitely set at A Pound A Bottle! Instead of stealth taxing us (currently) £1.57 on every bottle we buy!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Silent Majority speaks out to the UK Government to say: They should prosecute the law breakers, but do not persecute us because of the few who inappropriately consume alcohol. History informs us that excessive taxation and prohibition only further encourages lawbreaking.  We have the right to be able to live free of 'stealth taxation', that eats away at our quality of life and the simple pleasures that we have. The long arm of the UK Government should not reach into our kitchens, our empty purses and onto our dining room tables, taking unnecessarily, under the guise of discouraging abuse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
